Name: Shot the Body
About the game: In this app, you can shot and run inside the body. 1- Multiple jumping abilities to reach all areas. 2- Ability to show and hide the body systems ay time. 3- You can destroy and take the information of any organ. 4- Quiz in finding the body organs from bones, muscles and the other body systems The female body systems are designed according to medical references: -Circulatory system -Digestive system -Endocrine system -Immune system and lymphatic system -Muscular system -Nervous system -Renal system and Urinary system -Reproductive system -Respiratory system -Skeletal system
